component.name: Mutagen Sync Manager
component.summary: A modern desktop app for managing Mutagen file synchronization

description.p: Mutagen Sync Manager is a modern desktop application for managing Mutagen file synchronization sessions with an intuitive graphical interface.

Originally developed by SitepactJA to streamline plugin development workflows on live server environments, this tool enables seamless real-time file synchronization between local development machines and remote servers via SSH.

ul.li: Easy Connection Setup - Configure SSH connections with automatic key management
Real-time Monitoring - Watch sync status, conflicts, and connection health
Multiple Sync Modes - Two-way sync, one-way-safe, and one-way-replica modes
Conflict Resolution - Visual interface for resolving file conflicts
Session Management - Pause, resume, flush, and terminate sync sessions
Import/Export - Backup and restore your connection configurations

description.p: Perfect for web developers, plugin developers, and DevOps engineers who need reliable bidirectional file sync over SSH for live server development.
Note: Mutagen CLI must be installed separately on your system.

ul.li: Improved initial session loading with retry logic
Updated Help menu with documentation links
